tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CDRs (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  caller_number VARCHAR(10),
  callee_number VARCHAR(10),
  call_duration INT,
  call_cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
  call_start_time TIMESTAMP,
  call_end_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE CDRs (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  caller_id INT,
  receiver_id INT,
  call_duration INT,
  call_time TIMESTAMP,
  call_type VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE CDRs (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  caller_phone_number VARCHAR(15),
  receiver_phone_number VARCHAR(15),
  call_start TIMESTAMP,
  call_end TIMESTAMP,
  call_duration INTERVAL,
  call_cost DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE Billing (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  billing_period_start DATE,
  billing_period_end DATE,
  total_call_cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
  payment_status VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE CDRs (
    cdr_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    caller_number VARCHAR(20),
    receiver_number VARCHAR(20),
    call_duration INT,
    call_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE CallAnalysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    cdr_id INT REFERENCES CDRs(cdr_id),
    call_type VARCHAR(20),
    call_rating INTEGER,
    analysis_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
    email VARCHAR(50),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20),
    billing_address VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE cdrs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    caller_number VARCHAR(10),
    receiver_number VARCHAR(10),
    call_duration INT,
    call_datetime TIMESTAMP
);
